articles.author: Kritti Bhalla
articles.title: Byju’s, Swiggy, Dream11 and Ola are among the highest valued startups in India - Business Insider India
articles.description: Byju Raveendran-led Byju’s is the highest valued startup in India but it is also the highest valued edtech company in the world. The company has over 100 million across India and is currently making all efforts into expanding globally | Reported valuation: $2…
articles.content: Five Indian startups Icertis, Ola Electric, Pine Labs, VerSe and OfBusiness are currently valued at $5 billion. Ola Electric is a sister company to Ola, meanwhile VerSe is the parent company of Daily… [+26 chars]
